snippet: The state owes local public schools $137 million because lawmakers did not properly pass previous school funding formulas, Judge Janice Clark ruled Monday.
lead_paragraph: The state owes local public schools $137 million because lawmakers did not properly pass previous school funding formulas, Judge Janice Clark ruled Monday.

headline.main: Louisiana: Judge Says State Owes $137 Million to Schools
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Judge Says State Owes $137 Million To Schools
